overview:
Rebecca Miskin started at iVillage Networks as General Manager in October, 2008.

Prior to iVillage, Miskin worked at iVillage UK, the UK’s website for women, including ongoing brand and site development, increasing its user base and expanding revenuestreams. Miskin joined iVillage in October 2007, after working at numerous established media businesses, such as Reed Telemedia and IPC Media as well as digital media company Excite UK.
